It was about the size of her hand and thought to have come from a Delta II.

In 1997, Lottie Williams was walking in a park when a piece of a rocket fuel tank fell on her shoulder. She took it to a library, an astronomy club, and a research center to confirm that it was from outer .

‡πÄ‡∏ß‡πá‡∏öLottie Williams. Actress: Dark Victory. Lottie Williams was born on 20 January 1874 in Indianapolis, Indiana, USA. She was an actress, known for Dark Victory (1939), Yesterday's Wife (1923) and The Barefoot Boy (1923). She died on 16 November 1962 in Los Angeles, California, USA.

Charlotte Louise Johnson, known as Lottie Williams and Lottie Thompson, 1866 ‚Äì March 17, 1929, was a Harlem actress, singer, and dancer. A pioneering performer in African-American musical theater, she is best remembered for starring in several stage works with her second husband, Bert Williams, both on Broadway and in .
